attributes.title: Someone help SOS
attributes.review: I am not a conspiracy theorist, nor do I find myself fascinated by the paranormal. I am a man of science and reason. I have a degree from the finest of universities, Yale, where I specialized in Hacking. To make a long story short, upon cracking into the mainframe and stunning the hardline, I managed to get a look at the code behind this app, full of treasonous secrets and incriminating material. Trump himself has been uploaded into the app in aims to create a mass surveillance of the good people of the United States. Living in fear that our people will invoke their constitutional right to overthrow the government, he has partnered with Disney, Comcast and AT&T to create a Top Secret plan to put Donaldâ€™s uploaded consciousness in the palms and pockets of our people. I tried deleting the app, but when analyzing the hard drive on my 11 Pro Max I was shocked to see that all my permissions were set on Always for the Official Trump 2020 App. I posted this on reddit but my account was suspended and my post deleted. I then started seeing projections of trump telling me that he was coming for me, and my phone started texting everyone in my contacts about how to save on a 2020 Nissan LEAF. I hopped on a private to flee the country but when I went to talk to the pilot I saw it was Mike Pence. I begged for his mercy but he flew me to a remote island where I have seen a heavily guarded facility in which Donald has been spotted with Epstein, who is still alive. I am tweeting this now from a satellite iPhone I found during my recreation time. I am begging someone to come find me, please. Why did he have a cane? Why did he look like Russel Borchert?
